hanzi-su-wiki:
募

Значения

Объявлять набор; усиливаться, накапливаться (о трудностях); обостряться

Мнемоника

Дополнительный призыв, когда силы 力 армии уже на исходе 莫.
purpleculture_pinyin:
mù
canvass for contributions; to recruit; to collect; to raise
сбор пожертвований; набирать; собирать; поднять
rtega_mnemonic:
募募RSlevy, raise, summon, recruit
  • a strong arm 力 at night 莫 in a bar: he's been recruited to raise money at the door
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 莫 indicates the sound; 力 (strength) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
募集 [ mù jí ]: to raise; to collect
募捐 [ mù juān ]: to solicit contributions; to collect donations
招募 [ zhāo mù ]: to recruit; to enlist
筹募 [ chóu mù ]: to raise funds; to collect money
募化 [ mù huà ]: to collect alms (Buddhism)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 莫 [ mò ] cannot; do not; is not; negative
    • 力 [ lì ] strength, power; capability, influence
heisig_chinese_memo: The necromancer hangs out at the local graveyard and uses his dark powers to recruit an army of undead.
heisig_constituent: recruit, graveyard, flowers, sun, day, large, St. Bernard, power, muscle, arnold
Keyword_KANJIDIC: recruit, campaign, gather (contributions), enlist, grow violent
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: рекрут, кампания, собирать (вклады), завербовать, растет насильственным
koohiiStory1: The necromancer hangs out at the local graveyard and uses his dark powers to recruit an army of undead. Emphasize the verb form to keep distinct from the noun cadet (#1173).
koohiiStory2: WANTED: Hardworking GRAVEYARD diggers. Must have 6 months experience with POWERFUL muscles as will be working in South Africa burying deceased elephants.
jp_example_words:
応募(おうぼ): subscription, application
公募(こうぼ): public appeal, public contribution
募る(つのる): to invite, to solicit help participation etc
募金(ぼきん): fund-raising, collection of funds
募集(ぼしゅう): recruiting, taking applications
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A greenhouse is the newest power of the city you decided to recruit. You’re trying to recruit all the buildings in town and the greenhouse was the next on your list. It adds just a little bit of power to the town, but it's important nonetheless.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine what you had to do to recruit this greenhouse. Imagine schmoozing with the previous greenhouse owners to recruit them to your cause and sell you the greenhouse.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After you recruit the greenhouse, you recruit Bobo (ぼ) the clown to guard it for you. Bobo the clown has a terrifying amount of power so he’ll make an excellent guard for the greenhouse.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Recruit Bobo the clown. Look at him. He’s terrifying. Bobo will make for a great deterrent for entry to your greenhouse.
Ru_Meaning: recruit, campaign, gather (contributions), enlist, grow violent
Ru_Radicals: 力 (сила), 大 (большой), 艾 (мокса), 日 (день)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: make an effort (力) - you must not (莫) appeal for (something)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The necromancer hangs out at the local graveyard and uses his dark powers to recruit an army of undead.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " force " to " mo " sound. The original meaning is to solicit and solicit widely. "Shuowen": "Recruit, ask for more. Work hard, not sound." Such as "Historical Records. "Xiaojing Benji": "In May, raise money to relocate to Yangling Mausoleum, and give 200,000 yuan." "Recruitment to Yangling Mausoleum" means a broad recruitment of people who can move to Yangling Mausoleum. Also "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. Qin Law Miscellaneous Copy 35 "Recruitment and return", the organizer's note: "Recruitment, which means crowd-raising, refers to the recruited sergeant." "Recruitment" means that the sergeant who responded to the recruitment returns home.

" Raise " refers specifically to conscription. Such as "Han Shu. "Wang Mang's Biography": "Recruit 300,000 prisoners, Ding males, and soldiers from all over the world." Three Kingdoms Wei Cao Cao's "Langxian Ziming Book Order": "Therefore thousands of people in the battle of Bianshui, and later they went to Yangzhou to recruit more. There are no more than three thousand people, so the original will be limited.
humanum_short_description_en: From " strength " to " mo " sound. The original meaning is to solicit and solicit widely.
humanum_full_description:
從「力」，「莫」聲。本義是廣泛徵求、募集。《說文》：「募，廣求也。从力，莫聲。」如《史記．孝景本紀》：「五月，募徙陽陵，予錢二十萬。」「募徙陽陵」意謂廣泛募集可遷徙到陽陵的百姓。又《睡虎地秦簡．秦律雜抄》簡35「冗募歸」，整理者注：「冗募，意即眾募，指募集的軍士。」「冗募歸」的意思是響應招募的軍士回鄉。

　　「募」也特指徵兵。如《漢書．王莽傳中》：「募天下囚徒、丁男、甲卒三十萬人。」三國魏曹操〈讓縣自明本志令〉：「故汴水之戰數千，後還到揚州更募，亦復不過三千人，此其本志有限也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「力」，「莫」聲。本義是廣泛徵求、募集。

從「 力 」，「 莫 」聲。本義是廣泛徵求、募集。《說文》：「募，廣求也。从力，莫聲。」如《史記．孝景本紀》：「五月，募徙陽陵，予錢二十萬。」「募徙陽陵」意謂廣泛募集可遷徙到陽陵的百姓。又《睡虎地秦簡．秦律雜抄》簡35「冗募歸」，整理者注：「冗募，意即眾募，指募集的軍士。」「冗募歸」的意思是響應招募的軍士回鄉。 「 募 」也特指徵兵。如《漢書．王莽傳中》：「募天下囚徒、丁男、甲卒三十萬人。」三國魏曹操〈讓縣自明本志令〉：「故汴水之戰數千，後還到揚州更募，亦復不過三千人，此其本志有限也。」

募字的基本解释

募
mù
广泛征求：招募。募集。募捐。募款。募兵。征募。

募字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mù］
［《廣韻》莫故切，去暮，明。］
(1)募集；招求。
(2)通“膜”。参见“募俞”、“募原”。
[②]［bó］
［《字彙補》邦客切］
水名。

募字的英文翻译

◎ 募
collect, raise, recruit

募字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　募； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页148第40
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫故切，音暮。【說文】廣求也。从力，莫聲。【廣韻】召也。【增韻】招也。又【集韻】亡遇切，音務。以財使也。

募字的源字形

募字的起名意思

本义为征召，有广泛征求的意思。

Name meaning
The original meaning is enlistment, and it has the meaning of extensive solicitation.
形声字。力表意,表示尽力广泛搜求;莫(mo)表声,莫是暮的初文,古农牧时代,日暮必搜寻放牧在外的牛羊和日间所
用的农具。本义是征求、征集。

Раздел:
mù
I гл.
1) вербовать, объявлять набор; подбирать; собирать
募选阅材伎之士 тщательно подбирать и проверять способных людей
募兵 вербовать (набирать) солдат
2) собирать по подписке, делать сборы
募了一笔款子 собрать по подписке сумму денег
募捐 делать сбор по подписке
II сущ.
кит. мед. грудобрюшная полость; точки груди и живота, где собирается Ци данных органов
III собств.
ист. геогр. (сокр. вм. 募水) Мушуй (река, упоминаемая в летописях)
Radicals: 莫, 力  (greenhouse, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
A greenhouse is the newest power of the city you decided to recruit. You’re trying to recruit all the buildings in town and the greenhouse was the next on your list. It adds just a little bit of power to the town, but it's important nonetheless.
Imagine what you had to do to recruit this greenhouse. Imagine schmoozing with the previous greenhouse owners to recruit them to your cause and sell you the greenhouse.
Reading Mnemonic
After you recruit the greenhouse, you recruit Bobo (ぼ) the clown to guard it for you. Bobo the clown has a terrifying amount of power so he’ll make an excellent guard for the greenhouse.
Recruit Bobo the clown. Look at him. He’s terrifying. Bobo will make for a great deterrent for entry to your greenhouse.
